short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the downloads directly to Folx app with the right click of a mouse on a file in your browser
short.ru: Отправляет ссылки на файлы в Folx через контекстное меню браузера

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Folx add-on allows either automatic capturing of download links or adding new downloads to Folx with the right-click menu in Chrome browser. Compatible with Folx starting with version 5.0. Folx is an app for fast and convenient downloading of files from Internet. This download manager has an easy Mac-style interface and allows prioritizing your downloads, resuming interrupted downloads, and splitting the downloads in threads. Folx allows convenient scheduling of downloading process and can be integrated with iTunes. You can also control the download speed, tag the downloaded files to easily locate them on computer, and more.
